title: Queue and Stack implementation
description: implementes stack using queue and queue using stack also understood fundamentals of stack

title: LeetCode 155 and 20: Min Stack and valid parenthesis
description: Solved the LeetCode 'Min Stack' problem (155). Implemented a stack that supports push, pop, top, and retrieving the minimum element in constant time using an auxiliary stack. Gained a deeper understanding of stack operations, handling duplicate minimums, and designing O(1) solutions.and solved easy level leetcode 20th question
